content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates; status: NO_FUEL; warning: "out of fuel"; furnace_source holds 48 units of iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates; status: NO_INGREDIENTS; warning: "no ingredients to smelt"; fuel inventory contains 2 units of coal and furnace_result holds 6 copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) configured with 10 automation science packs; status: NO_POWER; research set to automation; electrical_id updated to 7592.
- ElectricityGroup (id=7592) connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (8.5, 6.5) and (10.5, 7.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Generator (steam engine) at position(2.5, 21.5) for power generation; status: NOT_CONNECTED; warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"]; connection points: (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5); neighbours include several connected pipe entities.
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) for steam production; status: NO_FUEL; warning: "out of fuel"; fluid_box holds approximately 200 units of water at 15°; connection points: (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); steam output point: (-7.5, 24.5); fluid_system updated to [27628].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water extraction; status: WORKING; connection point: (-9.5, 23.5); fluid_box holds 100 units of water at 15°; fluid_system updated to [27628].
- Pipeline Network comprising:
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=27628 at position(-6.5, 20.5) – status: WORKING.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=27629 at position(-2.5, 20.5) – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=27630 at position(-0.5, 21.5) – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=27635 at position(-3.5, 23.5) – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=27634 at position(-7.5, 25.5) – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=27639 at position(3.5, 25.5) – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=27638 at position(2.5, 24.5) – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=27641 at position(-0.5, 28.5) – status: EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Repeated Connection Attempts with Incorrect Fluid System Identifiers:
  - Several connection attempts used fluid_system IDs [26940, 26983, 27026, 27069, 27112, 27155, 27198, 27241, 27284, 27327, 27370, 27413, 27456, 27499, 27542, 27585] without locating a valid PipeGroup. Confirm and employ the active fluid system identifier (currently [27628]) before attempting a connection.

• Inadequate Pipeline Readiness Verification:
  - Relying solely on a fixed 10‑second delay for pipeline stabilization has repeatedly failed to yield a working connection. Integrate dynamic connectivity checks to ensure readiness prior to initiating connection attempts.
